column2: "ARKS members these days! So many of them neglect to upgrade their weapons and armor. We shouldn't let them slack off like that, if you ask me."
"Going into battle without upgrading the weapons you entrust your life to... Well, that's just foolish."
"What about you? Maybe you ought to go do some upgrades, while we're on the subject."
"Upgrade what? Your weapons and armor! Haven't you been listening? You'd best pay attention. Now go use your grinder at the Item Lab."
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Now go put my mind at ease by making some upgrades, all right?"
"You can upgrade weapons at the Item Lab. Upgrading allows you to customize your weapons and armor units."
"You need the following to perform an upgrade: - A grinder - Meseta  Note that they will be used up in the process of upgrading weapons and armor."
"Upgrading may succeed or it may fail. When it succeeds, item performance improves. When it fails, there is a chance that item performance may decline."
"Upgraded items show a value from +1 to +10 after their name in the item data."
